nodes.beat: Jack, a young boy living in a subatomic world known as the Quantum Realm, receives a handful of magic beans from a mysterious entity.
Jack, out of curiosity, plants the beans which grow into a gigantic quantum beanstalk.
Jack climbs the beanstalk and finds himself in a macroscopic world.
He encounters a giant who owns a goose that lays golden eggs.
Jack steals the goose and escapes the giant's clutches.
Jack returns to the Quantum Realm with the goose, bringing prosperity to his family.
Jack, instead of planting the beans, decides to examine them using his Quantum Microscope.
The beans react to the microscope's quantum beam, causing them to grow into a quantum beanstalk.
He encounters a giant who possesses a harp that can foretell the future.
Jack steals the harp and outwits the giant.
Jack returns to the Quantum Realm with the harp, enabling his community to prepare for future events.
Jack, a quantum physicist living in the Quantum Realm, receives a handful of magic beans from a parallel universe.
Jack uses his Quantum Accelerator to energize the beans, resulting in a gigantic quantum beanstalk.
Jack, using his quantum watch, freezes time and steals the goose.
Jack returns to the Quantum Realm with the goose, solving the resource crisis in his world.
Jack, using his Quantum Displacer, teleports the harp to his realm.
Jack returns to the Quantum Realm with the harp, ushering an era of foresight and progress.
